alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Beauregard and western Calcasieu Parishes through 700 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edgerly, or near Sulphur, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, De Quincy, Starks, Moss Bluff, Lunita, Buhler, Gillis, Edgerly and Carlyss. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 7 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
